content: how to read intarsia charts worked flat back and forth video tutorial from planetpurl https //youtu be/byuccpwv1l4 how to lock the colors together when working intarsia video tutorial from very pink knits https //youtu be/ptjdamqxlau sweater flight 1 by ouisi hamilton for chattanooga yarncrafters page # 10 drop shoulder setup cut a 10 /25cm length of mc and reserve divide mc into two balls mc1 and mc2 front panel cut a 6 piece of waste yarn with cc co 29 sts row 1 k2 p1 k1 to last st k1 row 2 p2 k1 p1 to last st p1 row 3 k8 kfb k10 kfb k to end 31 sts break yarn work chart beginning at row 4 a wrong side row row 33 right side k14 place rem sts on waste yarn *row 34 p across row 35 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 13 sts repeat from * three more times 10 sts work one more p row and bobble sweater flight 1 by ouisi hamilton for chattanooga yarncrafters page # 11 place rem 17 sts on needle in position for a right-side row row 1 bo3 k across 14 sts *row 2 p across row 3 k1 ssk k to end 13 sts repeat from * three more times 10 sts work one more p row and bobble back panel with cc co 29 sts row 1 k1 p1 to last st k1 row 2 p1 k1 to last st p1 row 3 k8 kfb k10 kfb k to end 31 sts break yarn and change to larger ball of mc work 39 more row st st bobble sleeves mattress stitch shoulders together open sweater up and count 22 row down from the shoulder seam on one of the panels with mc pick up a stitch along the panel edge in this row working up toward the shoulder seam pick up a stitch in the next row skip the following row then pick up a stitch in each of the next two row until there are 30 sts on the needle 15 from the front panel and 15 from the back st st 3 row row 4 right side k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 28 sts row 5 p across repeat row 4 & 5 once then row 4 again 24 sts break mc row 9 with cc p across row 10 k2 p1 k1 to end row 11 p1 k1 to last 2 sts p2 bobble leave 12 /30cm tail for seaming repeat this process on the opposite edge of the sweater to make the second sleeve seam up sweater sides and sleeves neckline with mc beginning at the left shoulder seam to the right of the collar when viewing sweater from the front pick up sts around the neckline as follows 10 sts down neckline 3 sts across center front bind-off 10 sts up neckline to shoulder seam 13 sts across back edge 36 sts distribute on three needles for
